about_the_game:
Step into a world of chaos and mayhem in this unique shoot-'em-up tight platformer and follow our stumbling clumsy secret agent in his freefall into a mysterious underground world and save the world from a doomsday event. Navigate through factory halls and rooms, collect firearms and ammunition, avoid hazards, kill an endless stream of villains and foes, and overcome all sorts of obstacles and boss fights.

The gameplay entails jumping, dashing via backward shooting, precise shooting, weapon switching, and a narrative guided by your choices. The tone captures the spirited essence of light-hearted humor and tough gameplay scenarios. Lightning-fast respawns keep you fighting as you uncover the sinister plans of Dr. Hibbles.
detailed_description:
Step into a world of chaos and mayhem in this unique shoot-'em-up tight platformer and follow our stumbling clumsy secret agent in his freefall into a mysterious underground world and save the world from a doomsday event. Navigate through factory halls and rooms, collect firearms and ammunition, avoid hazards, kill an endless stream of villains and foes, and overcome all sorts of obstacles and boss fights.

The gameplay entails jumping, dashing via backward shooting, precise shooting, weapon switching, and a narrative guided by your choices. The tone captures the spirited essence of light-hearted humor and tough gameplay scenarios. Lightning-fast respawns keep you fighting as you uncover the sinister plans of Dr. Hibbles.

short_description: Step into a world of chaos and mayhem in this unique shoot-'em-up tight platformer and follow our stumbling clumsy secret agent in his freefall into a mysterious underground world. Uncover the sinister plans of Dr. Hibbles. And save the world. A game from a father and his son.
